query: UPDATE specialOffers SET discountType = 'percentage' WHERE nameEn LIKE '%Referral%' OR nameEn LIKE '%Property Manager%';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2j9NYXgTnYir7Mh.root --database Htf64TWdaDvosPeCL5WWib --execute UPDATE specialOffers SET discountType = 'percentage' WHERE nameEn LIKE '%Referral%' OR nameEn LIKE '%Property Manager%';
